title: For safe's sake: a call for free swimming instruction
subtitle: Deon Sheppard
startArtical:
l have been thinking a lot lately about water safety. You see, my little brother fell
off the dock at Linda Lake last month. l was terrifeid, but then he finally swam to
shore. Now l get it. EveryBody should learn how to swim.
artical:
On average,two children drown in this country every day. That's terrible,so how
do we stop it? liz cho,a local swimming coach,says,'kids who take swimming
lesson are much less likely to drown. 'lt seems to me that not learning how to swim
is very dangerous. 

Central Park has large swimming pools and many swimming instructors on staff.
It would be a good idea for the park to offer kids free swimming lessons. l think it 
minght just save their lives.
